articles.description: The study focuses on a fossil that was dug up in 2015 during an excavation in northeast North Dakota where a nearly complete skull, jaws and cervical spine were all recovered, according to the Amer…
articles.content:
A recent scientific discovery claims that giant sea lizards with angry eyebrows roamed the waters over what has become North Dakota more than 80 million years ago.
The new species has been dubbed th… [+2346 chars]
